description: Sluggish economic growth around the world has worsened the crisis. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Spate of Indian diamond worker suicides as industry reels from Ukraine, Gaza wars
title_page: Spate of Indian diamond worker suicides as industry reels from Ukraine, Gaza wars | The Straits Times
maintext:
NEW DELHI – The two ongoing wars in Ukraine and Gaza are having a devastating impact on India’s diamond industry, which is responsible for about 90 per cent of global diamond cutting and polishing.
Russia and Israel are major sources of India’s rough diamond imports.
